concept.title: Additional Drivers
concept.shortdesc: You can install additional drivers for stages.

conbody.p: driversinstalling additional for stagesBefore you use the JMS Consumer and JDBC Consumer origins, you need to install drivers for the implementation that you want to use. For example, to use the JMS Consumer to read from Oracle, install the Oracle JMS drivers.
Drivers for other stages are optional. For example, you can install custom classes for the JavaScript or Jython Evaluators.
